name: FantasyV2.com
overview:
FantasyV2.com utilizes the best aspects of fantasy and other online football games to create a new game focused on the playoffs. The game is part traditional fantasy football (pick a roster of players to earn points every week), part survivor pool (you can only use players once for the entire playoffs - choose wisely!) and part pick’em (you want to pick from the losing team to keep more options open in future rounds).

FantasyV2.com was developed by a bunch of guys who love to play fantasy sports and wanted to share their new playoff game with a few friends. They ran it on a spreadsheet since 2003 and finally decided to build a website. Why be bummed when the regular fantasy season ends and football is just getting exciting? So they created a game that would keep people interested during the palyoffs and offer a little more strategy than traditional fantasy games. No big company agenda - just a love of fantasy sports.
